page.title: 15MODERN INDUSTRY IN NESTON
page.content: Among some established industrial concerns has appeared recently an important{Hi-Tech}industry, run by the Marconi electronics company. Its main business is the making of{guidance {systems}for{torpedos.}This development has helped to cure some of the{high {unemployment}in the area.There are also hopes that there might be further developments in what could be a{ {Science Park.}Unfortunately there is prime farm-land on this site so there is a conflict. There is also an{Advance Factory {Site}for small businesses. Some which have taken advantage of this site are garages, a bakery, double-glazing contractors, pet supply wholesalers and bathroom fitters. {Merseyside}is badly hit by the high unemployment of the 1980s and these schemes offer hope for the future.
